DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the project is to evaluate effectiveness of a multidimensional pharmaceutical care plan in improving compliance among elderly polypharmacy users at community pharmacy settings. The specific objective of the project is to determine effects of pharmaceutical care program on medication adherence and persistence among elderly polypharmacy users.
DOC.brief_title: Improving Compliance Among Elderly Polypharmacy Users Through Community Pharmacy Based Pharmaceutical Care Program
DOC.criteria: Both men and woman aged more than 65 years and taking more than 2 drugs Inhabitants of nursing homes People receiving unit dose dispensing of medicine
